<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass">MachineFunctionPass</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass">MachineFunctionPass</a> - This class adapts the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpass">FunctionPass</a> interface to allow convenient creation of passes that operate on the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> representation. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file defines the MachineFunctionPass class.  MachineFunctionPass&#39;s are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just FunctionPass&#39;s, except they operate on machine code as part of a code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generator.  Because they operate on machine code, not the LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representation, MachineFunctionPass&#39;s are not allowed to modify the LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representation.  Due to this limitation, the MachineFunctionPass class takes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// care of declaring that no LLVM passes are invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"></CodeLine>
